name: Cat Search In The Wild West
name_original: Cat Search In The Wild West
description:
Yee ha!

The cats are hiding all over this western town! Can you find the all? Some cats are more hidden than others. Some rest on the rooftops, others inside buildings, while others in plain view. Keep an eye out for the hidden wanted posters, maybe the cat outlaws are lurking nearby!

KEY FEATURES
  • 🐱100 Hidden cats
  • 🤠5 Hidden cat outlaws
  • 📜5 Hidden wanted posters
  • 🔎10 Hints
  • 🏜️Hand-Drawn western town
  • 😸A lot of meowing sound effects
  • 🏆100 Achievements!
